committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Civil Defense Act of 1950 to require that any construction carried out using Federal funds include design features to provide disaster shelter.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Civil Defense Act of 1950 to require any federally funded construction project to be designed to include features to maximize population protection from natural or manmade disasters.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Civil Defense Act of 1950 to require that any construction carried out using Federal funds include design features to provide disaster shelter.
